BrightBlade, Rage

*BrightBlade saw Hell Beast come out of the base and answer Zardus's calls, 
she shrugged and transformed into her beast mode.
She looked over her shoulder at Gangon and then started off in the direction 
that she had last seen Megatron go in.*

" Come on, slow poke! We have to get a drop on Megatron and I want to make a 
report on him to send back to Hell Beast TONIGHT!"

*With that she began to run off in a northernly direction, Megatron wouldn't 
be able to escape her!"

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage crouched low but her size made it imposable to hide in the field's 
grass, the herbavores never came near enough to snach.
Rage snarled and sprang to her feet, she snapped at a gazell as it sprang 
away and missed it. She tryed a number of times but she couldn't manage to 
catch a meal for her rumballing stomach!
Rage then looked up at the structure that sat a fair distance away and 
sighed, perhaps there was easier food there?
She got down to all fours and began to walk, her chest had begun to hurt 
from the waight of her back and walking on all fours helped ease it. She 
ambled along, looking from left to right as she walked towards the metal 
structure.
Prehaps supper would be soon?*
